glsa.title: FreeType: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in FreeType could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: FreeType is a high-quality and portable font engine.

description.p: A stack-based buffer overflow exists in Freetypeâ€™s cf2_hintmap_build function in cff/cf2hints.c.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition via specially crafted font file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All FreeType users should upgrade to the latest version:
Packages which depend on this library may need to be recompiled. Tools such as revdep-rebuild may assist in identifying these packages.
